existing_features.title: Implement an audience participant limit of 13 concurrent audience members for the Audience screen, enforced by the backend so it cannot be bypassed from the frontend.

Update the Audience screen UI to attempt to join on mount and leave on unmount (best-effort), and show an English user-facing error state when the audience limit is reached (e.g., 'Audience limit reached (13). Please try again later.').
Expose the current audience count in the Audience screen (and/or header area) using the new backend query so viewers can see how many audience members are currently connected out of 13.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an audience live call participant limit of 13

Add backend APIs to support audience presence tracking: a method to join the audience, a method to leave the audience, and a query method to fetch current audience count (and/or list) needed by the UI.

projectName: Add audience live call participant limit of 13
